entities.name: the man
entities.description: The man is described as giving a howl of pain after being hit by a spell in his face. He then pounds away after the brother and sister.

entities.name: brother
entities.description: The brother is mentioned as one of the people that the man is pounding after.

entities.name: sister
entities.description: The sister is also mentioned as one of the people that the man is pounding after.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is described as scrambling up from the floor and sprinting along the corridor.

entities.name: Snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as having an immense head-start in the chase.

entities.name: the Order
entities.description: The Order is mentioned as possibly making steps to secure the Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.

relationships.description: Harry and Snape are described as being in a chase, with Harry trying to catch up to Snape.
The man is pounding after the brother.
The man is also pounding after the sister.

relationships.entity_2: Cabinet in the Room of Requirement
relationships.description: Harry is trying to reach the Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.

relationships.entity_2: Cabinet in the Room of Requirement
relationships.description: It is possible that Snape has already entered the Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.
